section.p: You can leave possessions and money here to save having to carry them around with you. Write in the box anything you’re leaving here. Each time you return, :

outcomes.outcome: A thief; all the money you left here has gone

A gang of burglars;
lose all possessions you left here

section.p: You can also rest at your town house for as long as you wish. If injured, restore your Stamina to its normal unwounded score.
